item.text: Section GG: Functional Abilities and Goals

Self-Care. Code the {patient's/resident's} usual performance at {admission} for each activity using the 6-point scale. If activity was not attempted at {admission}, code the reason. Code the {patient's/resident's} {discharge} goal(s) using the 6 point scale. Use of codes 07, 09, 10, or 88 is permissible to code {discharge} goal(s).

Oral hygiene: The ability to use suitable items to clean teeth. Dentures (if applicable): The ability to insert and remove dentures into and from the mouth, and manage denture soaking and rinsing with use of equipment. - Discharge Performance
Eating: The ability to use suitable utensils to bring food and/or liquid to the mouth and swallow food and/or liquid once the meal is placed before the {patient/resident}. - Admission Performance

Toileting hygiene: The ability to maintain perineal hygiene, adjust clothes before and after voiding or having a bowel movement. If managing an ostomy, include wiping the opening but not managing equipment. - Discharge Performance
Eating: The ability to use suitable utensils to bring food and/or liquid to the mouth and swallow food and/or liquid once the meal is placed before the {patient/resident}. - Discharge Performance

Mobility. Code the {patient's/resident's} usual performance at {admission} for each activity using the 6-point scale. If activity was not attempted at {admission}, code the reason. Code the {patient's/resident's} {discharge} goal(s) using the 6-point scale. Use of codes 07, 09, 10, or 88 is permissible to code {discharge} goal(s).
Sit to lying - functional ability during 3D assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Lying to sitting on side of bed - functional ability during 3 day assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Sit to stand: The ability to come to a standing position from sitting in a chair, wheelchair, or on the side of the bed. - Admission Performance
Chair/bed-to-chair transfer - functional goal recorded during 3D assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Toilet transfer - functional goal recorded during 3D assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Walk 10 feet - functional goal recorded during 3D assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Walk 50 feet with two turns - functional goal recorded during 3D assessment period [CMS Assessment]
Walk 150 feet with two turns - functional goal recorded during 3D assessment period [CMS Assessment]
